solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int numIslands(char[][] grid) {--newline--        int islands = 0;--newline--        for (int i=0; i<grid.length; i++)--newline--            for (int j=0; j<grid[i].length; j++)--newline--                islands += sink(grid, i, j);--newline--        return islands;--newline--    }--newline--    int sink(char[][] grid, int i, int j) {--newline--        if (i < 0 || i == grid.length || j < 0 || j == grid[i].length || grid[i][j] == '0')--newline--            return 0;--newline--        grid[i][j] = '0';--newline--        for (int k=0; k<4; k++)--newline--            sink(grid, i+d[k], j+d[k+1]);--newline--        return 1;--newline--    }--newline--    int[] d = {0, 1, 0, -1, 0};--newline--}
